message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses a mechanism design for sponsored search auctions, which involves learning the relevance scores of advertisers and estimating the true value of clicks generated at the auction site. This falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT) as it involves designing a mechanism that incentivizes advertisers to reveal their true values. The paper also deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) as it discusses the estimation of relevance scores. The exploration mechanism involves ranking and slot allocation, which can be considered as a problem in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the efficiency and user experience of the proposed mechanism, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
